name: Gargoyle
description:
Gargoyles are malevolent, stone-skinned creatures that prey on the unwary.

**Combat**: Claws, bite, and horn attacks.

**Habitat/Society**: Ruins and ancient cities.

**Ecology**: Carnivorous hunters.

name: Genie, Marid
description:
Marids are water genies of great power and chaotic moods, masters of seas and rivers.

**Combat**: Water control and spell abilities.

**Habitat/Society**: Elemental Plane of Water.

**Ecology**: Command aquatic forces.
